contextId.information: These refer to fear caused by thinking about future events. Habakkuk uses several parts of his body to express that every part of him is afraid. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: my inner parts trembled! My lips quivered ... Decay comes into my bones ... under myself I tremble
